item.title: Deploying A Simple Python App to Kubernetes/OpenShift
item.description:
Description

"Deploying A Simple Python App to Kubernetes/OpenShift" by: JJ Asghar

JJ will walk you through deploying a simple python application to Kubernetes/OpenShift. We’ll start from the ground up, then get a complete automated build. The goal is to enable your developers to focus on code, not the infrastructure! It’s a chance to see the power of OpenShift and why taking the time to learn cloud native development can get you the velocity you need.

Recorded at the 2021 Python Web Conference (https://2021.pythonwebconf.com)
item.dc:creator: JJ Asghar

item.title: We Accidentally Created a Serverless Application
item.description:
Description

In this talk, we will describe our situation, and how we ended up with a serverless application by accident. We talk about where we started, our use case, and how it turns out leveraging FaaS, Python and the Code-Engine Serverless platform we created a system that is surprisingly robust and super cheap to run.
